questions.question 1: Which code is used for seismic design  of the structure?

explanations.a: IS 1893 is used for Seismic design considerations
explanations.b: IS 456-2000 is used for Plain and reinforced Concerete
explanations.c: IS 875 (Part 1) is used for the concedrations of dead load
explanations.d: IS 875 (Part 3) is used for the considerations of wind load

questions.question 2: Method that cannot be used to determine the forces in the members of frames is

questions.question 3: In a Linear elastic structural element the stiffness is

answers.d: Stiffness and flexibility are not related

explanations.a: In a Linear elastic structural element the stiffness is directly proportional to flexibility

questions.question 4: Which of the following assumptions is not made while analysis of a perfect frame

answers.a: All the members are pin jointed
answers.b: Self weight of the member is neglected
answers.c: All members are loaded at the centre
answers.d: All members are subjected to either compression  or tension

explanations.a: while analysis of a perfect frame all members are loaded at the centre

questions.question 5: The Ratio of Shear stress to shear strain is known as

explanations.a: The Ratio of Shear stress to shear strain is known as modulus of rigidity
